Specification: Instantly appealing for its stylishly renovated interiors, warm ambience and generous outdoor dimensions (808sqm approx), this inviting home is ready for immediate family enjoyment with plenty of space and potential to redevelop in the future if desired (STCA). Specification: Setting a new benchmark in luxurious lifestyle design, this brand-new residence sits peacefully at the rear of two and is perfected by premium appointments and a family-friendly floorplan in the Brentwood Secondary Zone (STSA). ,Every aspect of this home exudes excellence with the westerly oriented living and dining zone bathed in afternoon sunshine and embracing the allure of high ceilings and stylish flooring. ,Attached to this space is a magnificent kitchen that's certain to impress guests with its waterfall stone benches, 900mm Smeg oven/gas stove, Smeg dishwasher, soft close cabinetry, island breakfast bench and 2nd kitchen equipped with its own Smeg gas stove. ,The effortless flow between inside and out is achieved with sliding doors opening from the open plan domain onto a fabulous entertainer's deck and landscaped courtyard. ,Upstairs, a carpeted retreat adds to the comfort of the home and accompanies three of the four robed bedrooms, including one with direct ensuite effect access to the family bathroom that reflects designer style. ,On the ground floor, the master bedroom is spacious and flaunts comforting carpet, a fitted walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, additionally served by a powder room and laundry boasting a stone bench and storage cupboards. ,Superbly appointed with split system heating/air conditioning, alarm, CCTV camera, high ceilings, water tank, garden shed, Colorbond fences plus a double garage with internal access. ,Conveniently nestled within walking distance to Wheelers Hill Primary, Glen Waverley South Primary, Brentwood Secondary, Brandon Park Shopping Centre, buses and Brentwood Reserve, near Jells Park, Caulfield Grammar and Monash Freeway.,

At 29 squares (270 square metres approx.), this oversized town house offers the kind of space you'd expect in a home in the school zone for Brentwood Secondary (STSA), just a 5min drive to The Glen.,With 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a home office and its own street frontage and driveway, this is a family sized setting that still shines like new – having been built in 2019 but not occupied until 2021.,Above average in every way, this home features high ceilings on both levels, the convenience of a guest bedroom and adjoining bathroom on the ground floor and a back yard big enough for playing sport or fetch with the dog.,A bright and airy open plan kitchen and family room gives you room to entertain in style with an elite kitchen and walk-in pantry at your service.,Parents will appreciate a master bedroom with lovely north facing light and street frontage, in addition to a luxury bathroom with a freestanding bath and monsoon fixed shower head for rainfall style relaxation. ,Full height 3D white tiling brings dramatic edge to the bathrooms, with central heating, evaporative cooling, CCTV security and alarm, NBN connection and an oversized single garage with internal access adding to the impressive feature list.,Monash Fwy and Eastlink provide connections to the city and the coast, nearby Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and the new Victorian Heart Hospital, as well as popular parks, playgrounds and picnic spots including Central Reserve and Jells Park.

Certain to surpass all expectations, the classic exterior of this 4-bedroom plus study family home conceals a spectacular and carefully considered renovation where meticulous attention to detail is on display at every turn.,Thoughtfully zoned for family harmony and with an impressive raft of high-end inclusions throughout, the single level home opens to a wide entrance hall enhanced by beautiful pale oak flooring. Welcome to 37-39 Hunter Street, situated in the illustrious suburb of Glen Waverley, recognized as one of Melbourne's affluent neighborhoods. A mere 18 kilometers southeast of Melbourne's bustling CBD and within the City of Monash, this community is a harmonious blend of comfort, convenience, and top-tier amenities including elite educational institutions, comprehensive shopping, and a lively array of dining and entertainment.,Apartment 1.01 at 37-39 Hunter Street, Glen Waverley – a testament to luxurious and adaptable living in a premier Melbourne suburb. This three-bedroom, two-bathroom sanctuary, complete with two car spaces, encompasses a total area of 90.6 square meters, designed for comfort and elegance.,Inside, you'll find a spacious 81.9 square meters of internal living space paired with an 8.7 square meters external area. Reflecting modern living needs, Apartment 1.01 offers a choice between two color schemes, allowing residents to personalize their space to their taste, ensuring that each home is not just stylish but also a true reflection of its owner.,The Glen and Kingsway Commercial Street cater to all your retail and culinary desires, while educational excellence is just a walk away at Wesley College, not to mention Glen Waverley Secondary College and prominent universities like Monash and Deakin within close reach.,Connectivity is seamless, with Syndal Train Station on your doorstep and a network of bus routes, linking you effortlessly to the CBD and surrounding precincts. It is not just a residence but a confluence of elegance, sustainability, and unparalleled accessibility, with Wesley College within walking distance, representing the ultimate lifestyle for the discerning homeowner.

Dedicated to design excellence whilst delivering the highest level of luxury, this near new home indulges every aspect in life whilst promoting premium appointments, CBD views and prized placement in the Mount View Primary and Glen Waverley Secondary Zones (STSA). ,A celebration of quality craftsmanship, the home unfolds to reveal glamorous parquetry flooring that guides you through to a formal lounge room boasting designer lighting plus a Heat & Glo gas log fire. At the heart of the home, a double height void helps to filter light throughout, while the private theatre room comes equipped with a projector, screen and speakers and looks out towards the temperature controlled Visscool wine cellar. ,Beckoning gatherings with friends, the expansive kitchen, meals and family room is a culinary showpiece that embraces porcelain benches, Miele double ovens, Miele induction stove, integrated fridge/freezer, island breakfast bench plus a butler's kitchen boasting a Miele gas stove and Miele dishwasher. Offering a seamless transition for indoor-outdoor entertaining, glass doors with retractable flyscreens open onto an expansive entertainer's deck that's partially covered and accompanied by a synthetic turf backyard. ,Upstairs, a rumpus room provides a recreation sanctuary complete with a wet bar and accompanied by four of the five robed bedrooms including a guest bedroom with walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, plus a lavish master suite with CBD views, deep balcony, dressing room and indulgent double shower ensuite. On the ground floor, the 5th bedroom benefits from a walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, while the 4th bathroom rests upstairs and is supplemented by a ground floor powder room and fitted laundry with storage room and workbench. ,Finished to perfection with a 10kw solar panel system, Daikin 10 zone ducted heating/air conditioning unit, CCTV cameras, alarm, video intercom entry, keyless entry, double glazed windows, quality curtains and light switches plus a double garage with internal access and driveway gates. ,A masterpiece in every sense of the word, close to Mount View Primary, Glen Waverley Secondary, Caulfield Grammar, The Glen Shopping Centre, buses, Glen Waverley Station, Jells Park and freeways.
